actions.description: The aerosaur makes one Bite attack and one Talons attack.
actions.name: Multiattack

actions.description: 12 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 27 (3d12 + 8) piercing damage. If the target is a Huge or smaller creature, it has the grappled condition (escape DC 18). Until this grapple ends, the target has the restrained condition, and the aerosaur can't Bite another target.
actions.name: Bite

actions.description: 12 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 24 (3d10 + 8) slashing damage.
actions.name: Talons

actions.description: The aerosaur beats its wings, creating bursts of thunderous force. Each creature within 10 feet of the aerosaur must make a DC 20 Strength saving throw. On a failed save, a creature takes 38 (7d10) thunder damage, is pushed up to 30 feet horizontally from the aerosaur, and has the prone condition. On a successful save, a creature takes half as much damage and is pushed up to 15 feet horizontally from the aerosaur.
actions.name: Wing Gusts (Recharge 5-6)

specialTraits.description: The aerosaur has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.
specialTraits.name: Magic Resistance
